org.osdfreactive.policies

Interface CreatePolicyInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCreatePolicy

    public interface CreatePolicyInterface
    Creating high level network policies interface.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • createPolicy

        void createPolicy(java.lang.String policyName,
                  int priority,
                  PolicyState policyState,
                  int version,
                  java.util.List<org.onosproject.net.ConnectPoint> connectPointList,
                  java.util.List<org.onosproject.net.HostId> srcHostsList,
                  java.util.List<org.onosproject.net.HostId> dstHostsList,
                  PathSelectionAlgos pathSelectionAlgo,
                  TrafficProfile trafficProfile,
                  org.onosproject.net.region.Region srcRegion,
                  org.onosproject.net.region.Region dstRegion,
                  OperationsList action)
        *

        Creates a high level network policy based on given information including policy name, traffic profile, partial path information, source and destination regions.

        Parameters:
        policyName - policy name
        priority - policy priority
        policyState - policy state
        version - policy version
        connectPointList - connection points list
        srcHostsList - source hosts list
        dstHostsList - dst hosts list
        pathSelectionAlgo - path selection algorithm
        trafficProfile - traffic profile
        srcRegion - source region
        dstRegion - dst region
        action - action.

      • getPolicy

        Policy getPolicy()
        Returns a created policy.
        Returns:
        a policy
